description: Reforge pipeline intelligence signals - updated 3x daily by intel agent

email.description: Deal replies, meeting confirmations, objections from prospects

company_news.description: Funding rounds, acquisitions, leadership changes, layoffs
company_news.source: Web search on active pipeline + Grunt leads

hiring_signals.description: Job postings indicating growth/investment in product/growth teams

signals.summary: $150M Series E at $2B valuation (Oct 2025). Platform volume doubled to 10K cases/week. Legal tech funding at record high 2025. HOT COMPANY.
signals.action: Push for close - they have budget and momentum

signals.summary: Despite $360M Series D (Nov 2024), multiple layoff allegations (Mar 2025 Reddit, Glassdoor). 'Soft layoffs' reported. Government grant closing Mar 2025.
signals.source: BetaKit, Reddit r/Winnipeg, Winnipeg Free Press
signals.action: Validate budget still exists. Ask about team stability.

signals.summary: Acquired by Ecotrek (per Tracxn). $732M total funding, $1B valuation. Sustainability leader.
signals.action: Confirm acquisition doesn't affect buying timeline

signals.summary: Fox Corporation launching FOX One streaming service (Aug 2025) - consolidating content strategy across Fox properties.
signals.action: May affect Fox Local's budget/priorities. Confirm with contact.

signals.summary: New data center facility announced (Feb 2025). Active marketing campaigns. WordCamp US 2026 presence confirmed.
signals.action: Company investing in growth - good sign for deal

signals.summary: No recent funding since $9.5M Series C (Aug 2022). $39.3M total raised. Still active but no major news.
signals.action: May have budget constraints. Qualify carefully.
